channel.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
channel.description:
Can anyone answer these questions I have about potions?
[ul][li]How many effects can you have going on at once?[/li] [li]Is it one effect per skill, or does it have a maximum number, like the question above asks?[/li] [li]How fast does the skill restore to normal?[/li][/ul]
Also, any other information on this topic would be nice, I never really played RS, at least when I did I didn't pay attention to these small details.

item.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

  1. I assume you mean skill boosts I guess, so as many as you can put?
  2. Do you mean like taking a strength pot, then a extreme strength? Like David said it just overwrites it and will take you to the highest boost extreme potion does normally.
  3. Not sure entirely about this one, might depend on what your using, but I don’t know much about this

Read full topic

item.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

It should be handled the same as HP going up.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I see. So skills go back down at the same speed that health regenerates, I’m guessing that’s universal for all things of the sort.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Skills go down at one point per minute I believe

You can have an infinite number at once, but I do think it’s one per skill. So like if you have a 5 skill boost, an 8 skill boost will just overwrite it.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Doesn’t cover any of my questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick breakdown of potions?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

Potion

The Potion is a quest item that appears in the Watchtower quest. It is used to kill Ogre shaman that live in the caves below Gu'Tanoth. To make the potion the player must mix guam leaf, jangerberries and ground bat bones bones into a vial of water....

Here ^

Read full topic
